paper_abstract: We present a holography based optical architecture that computes Kronecker product of two given binary matrices in a single (configuration) step. We demonstrate the use of the holography capability to enlarge the input of size n into the size n(2) in one step, in contrast to the traditional optical copying techniques that duplicate the input by a fixed constant factor in a single step.
paper_title: Holographic parallel processor for calculating Kronecker product
